requirement.en: You have a face-up EARTH Attribute monster on your field.

effect.en: Fusion Summon a Dragon or Machine Type monster by sending face-up monsters from your field to the Graveyard as material. That monster gains 200 ATK. If a Level 7 EARTH Attribute Machine Type monster is used as material by this effect, its name can be treated as "Blue-Fang Burst Dragon" or "Red-Boot Boost Dragon".
